content:
Ukrainian border guards responded to pseudo -elections in Russia with the right "ballots" of different calibers.

Video greetingPublishedPress Service of the State Border Guard Service of Ukraine.

“The border guards also do not stand aside pseudo -elections in swamps and send their" ballots "directly to the heads of the occupiers.

We help make the right choice: 82mm, 105mm or 120-mm "Bulletin" ... Choose for yourself, "the military said.


As reportedArmyinform, Baba Yaga again fried a dozen of the invaders.
title: Ukrainian military sent their "ballots" of different calibers
description: The video greetings were posted by the press service of the State Border Service of Ukraine. ...
author: Army Inform
